page.title: 10PARENT PUPIL SURVEY.
page.content: As a result of a Survey carried out among parents and children of Parliament Street School,Stroud,it was discovered that the main recreational activities among parents are gardening, D.I.Y., sewing and knitting, rambling, art and craft, and sports, both active and spectator. The favourite hobbies or activities among Junior children were bike-riding, horse riding, reading, model-making, roller-skating, television, fishing, swimming,and karate or judo. The favourite playground games of the Junior children excluding Football or Netball were Tag , Marbles , Ball games , Skipping , Hopscotch , Hula-Hoops and Free-o.
